author: mturk
msg: Use the tomcat-native-1.1.10 as recommended version.

Note: 1.1.9 was broken for OpenSSL builds on some platforms. 1.1.8 will continue to work, although on some platforms there can be JVM crash if IPV6 is enabled and platform doesn't support IPV4 addresses on IPV6 sockets.

author: mturk
msg: Tag 1.1.10 with OpenSSL detection and init fix

author: mturk
msg: Increment version number and switch back to current and trunk for release.
